aboutVmls.label: VMLS
aboutVmls.title: About Vinayaka Mission's Law School
aboutVmls.description: Building India's premier law school for the AI age through innovation, excellence, and inclusivity.
aboutVmls.paragraph: With the founding vision of creating the law school of the future, VMLS admitted its first cohort of students in 2021. Mentored by India's finest law school, Jindal Global Law School, and supported by a committed team of full-time faculty members trained in globally renowned institutions, VMLS has pioneered pedagogic innovations that equip learners with the skills, knowledge, and specializations required for professional success in the modern legal landscape.

aboutVmls.title: About VMLS | Vinayaka Mission's Law School
aboutVmls.subtitle: The Law School of the Future
aboutVmls.paragraph1: Vinayaka Mission's Law School was founded with a clear purpose: to build a world-class, accessible, and future-oriented law school that brings global excellence to every learner. Since 2021, VMLS has grown under the academic mentorship of Jindal Global Law School and the leadership of faculty trained at internationally renowned universities.
aboutVmls.paragraph2: Our bilingual English–Tamil learning model ensures that legal education is not only rigorous and contemporary, but also inclusive—strengthening comprehension, breaking access barriers, and empowering students from diverse backgrounds. With a curriculum anchored in innovation, ethics, and experiential learning, VMLS prepares graduates to navigate the evolving landscape of law with clarity, skill, and purpose.
aboutVmls.facultyDescription: Academicians with global training who bring deep expertise, research strength, and student-centred mentorship.
aboutVmls.shapingFuture: VMLS — Shaping the Future of Law Since 2021
aboutVmls.aboutVmlsParagraph1: Shaping transformative legal education through innovation, inclusivity, and global vision. Vinayaka Mission's Law School (VMLS), established by Vinayaka Mission's Research Foundation – Deemed to be University (VMRF-DU), is dedicated to delivering legal education that responds to the rapidly evolving needs of local, national, and global communities. Founded with the vision of creating the law school of the future, VMLS welcomed its first cohort in 2021. Since then, mentorship from Jindal Global Law School and a committed team of full-time faculty—many trained at globally renowned institutions—have shaped a distinctive academic environment grounded in innovation and forward-looking pedagogy.
aboutVmls.aboutVmlsParagraph2: With state-of-the-art smart classrooms, a digitally enabled library, and a regal moot court hall, the campus provides an immersive learning atmosphere that encourages intellectual growth and active engagement. As a bilingual law school in Chennai, VMLS offers legal education in both English and Tamil, equipping students for global legal careers while remaining rooted in regional and cultural contexts. VMLS proudly upholds inclusivity as a core value, ensuring that every learner is supported and empowered to thrive.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To educate ethical and skilled legal professionals who combine intellectual rigour with empathy, and who are prepared to respond to the complexities of an evolving world. VMLS advances a learning environment that values inclusivity, innovation, and ethical responsibility.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become India's leading institution for bilingual legal education—renowned for academic distinction, transformative research, experiential learning, and a deep commitment to strengthening justice, equity, and social wellbeing. VMLS aspires to shape future-ready lawyers who lead with insight, integrity, and impact.

campusFacilities.title: Campus & Facilities
campusFacilities.description: Our modern campus in Paiyanoor, Chennai, is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities designed to support comprehensive legal education.

about.title: About VLAT (Vinayaka Mission's Law Admission Test)
about.description: The Vinayaka Mission's Law Admission Test(VLAT) is the official entrance examination conducted by Vinayaka Mission's Law School (VMLS) to assess the aptitude and preparedness of students seeking admission to various undergraduate and postgraduate law programmes. VLAT evaluates key skills essential for a successful legal career and provides a fair, transparent, and student-friendly pathway for law aspirants across the country.
about.experience: VLAT is designed to be a smooth, stress-free experience for students who wish to pursue law. With multiple test slots, an online format, and no negative marking, the exam ensures every student has the best opportunity to showcase their potential without unnecessary pressure.

whyConducted.title: Why is VLAT Conducted?
whyConducted.paragraph1: Vinayaka Mission's Law School (VMLS) recognizes that the legal profession requires not just knowledge of law, but also strong analytical abilities, critical thinking, and effective communication skills. VLAT is specifically designed to evaluate whether an applicant possesses the intellectual foundation necessary to excel in legal studies and the legal profession.
whyConducted.paragraph2: Instead of relying solely on board marks or subjective criteria, VLAT offers a merit-based, standardized way to identify motivated and capable students. The exam ensures that admission to VMLS is fair, accessible, and aligned with the school's commitment to academic excellence.

card1.title: Evaluates Key Skills
card1.description: Analytical abilities, critical thinking, and communication

card2.title: Merit-Based Selection
card2.description: Fair and standardized assessment for all candidates

programmes.title: Programmes You Can Apply For
programmes.description: Choose from our comprehensive range of law programmes designed to shape future legal professionals

examOverview.title: Exam Overview
examOverview.subtitle: Key details about the VLAT examination format

eligibility.title: VLAT Eligibility Criteria
eligibility.description: To be eligible for VLAT, candidates must meet specific educational qualifications and minimum marks requirements based on their chosen programme and category.

program1.title: 1. For 5-Year Integrated Programmes (BA LL.B., B.Com. LL.B., BBA LL.B.)
program1.qualification: Candidates must have passed their 10+2 (or equivalent) examination from a recognized board.

program2.title: 2. For 3-Year LL.B. Programme
program2.qualification: Candidates must have completed a Bachelor's degree (in any discipline) from a recognized university.

program3.title: 3. For LL.M. Programme
program3.qualification: Candidates must hold UG law degree from recognized university.

importantNotes.title: Important Notes
importantNotes.note1: Candidates appearing in their final year examination are also eligible to apply, subject to meeting the minimum marks criteria at the time of admission.
importantNotes.note2: Age limit and other specific requirements (if any) will be clearly mentioned in the official VLAT admission notification.
importantNotes.note3: Reservation policies follow government norms and are subject to change as per updated regulations.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: VLAT (Vinayaka Mission's Law Admission Test) is the official entrance examination conducted by Vinayaka Mission's Law School (VMLS) for admission to its undergraduate and postgraduate law programmes.
faq.a2: Yes, appearing for VLAT is mandatory for all applicants seeking admission to VMLS to ensure a fair merit-based selection process.
faq.q3: 3. Is VLAT conducted online or offline?
faq.a3: VLAT is a fully online, AI-proctored examination. You can take the exam from the comfort of your home using a laptop or desktop with a camera and microphone.
faq.a4: VLAT tests your aptitude in English Comprehension, Logical Reasoning, and Critical Thinking. It aims to evaluate your potential for legal studies rather than prior legal knowledge.
faq.q5: 5. How many questions does VLAT have?
faq.a5: The UG version consists of 40 questions, while the PG version consists of 80 questions. Both are designed to be completed within 60 minutes.
faq.q6: 6. Is there negative marking in VLAT?
faq.a6: No, there is zero negative marking in VLAT. You are encouraged to attempt all questions without fear of penalty.
faq.q7: 7. Can I write the exam in Tamil?
faq.a7: Yes, VMLS offers the unique option to take the exam in either English or Tamil. You can also switch between languages during the test.
faq.a8: VLAT scores are valid for admission to BA LL.B (Hons.), BBA LL.B (Hons.), B.Com LL.B (Hons.), 3-year LL.B (Hons.), and LL.M programmes at VMLS.
faq.q9: 9. How soon are VLAT results declared?
faq.a9: VLAT results are instant! Your score is displayed on your screen immediately after you submit the exam.
faq.q10: 10. Who is eligible to appear for VLAT?
faq.a10: For 5-year integ. courses, candidates who passed 10+2 are eligible. For 3-year LL.B, any graduate can apply. For LL.M, candidates with an LL.B degree are eligible to apply.

hero.title: How to Register for VLAT?
hero.description:
Registering for the Vinayaka Mission's Law Admission Test(VLAT) is simple, quick, and completely online.
Whether you are applying for a five-year integrated law programme, the three-year LL.B., or the LL.M., the entire
registration process can be completed from your home within minutes.

step1.title: 1. Visit the Official VMLS Website
step1.description:
Go to the official Vinayaka Mission's Law School website and navigate to the VLAT Admissions / Apply Now section.

This is where all updates, deadlines, and the registration link are available.

step2.title: 2. Create Your VLAT Account
step2.description:
Click on Register and create your account using:
• A valid email ID
• An active mobile number

You will receive important exam notifications, login information, and result updates through these details, so ensure they are correct.

step3.title: 3. Fill Out the Online Application Form
step3.description:
Once your account is created, log in and complete the VLAT application form.

You will be asked to provide:
• Personal details
• Academic qualifications
• Address and contact information
• Programme you wish to apply for (BA LL.B., B.Com LL.B., BBA LL.B., LL.B., or LL.M.)

Take your time and review each field to avoid mistakes.

step4.title: 4. Upload Required Documents
step4.description:
You will need to upload scanned copies of:
• A recent passport-size photograph
• Signature
• Academic certificates (Class 12 / Graduation / LL.B. depending on programme)
• Any ID proof if required

Make sure all files are clear and meet the size/format guidelines mentioned on the portal.

step5.title: 5. Pay the Application Fee
step5.description:
The payment is made online through secure digital gateways.

• ₹1000 for UG Programmes (BA LL.B., B.Com LL.B., BBA LL.B., LL.B.)
• ₹1500 for PG (LL.M.) Programme

Once the payment is successful, you will receive a receipt and confirmation email.

step6.title: 6. Submit Your Application
step6.description:
Before submitting the final form:
• Double-check your name, email, and academic details
• Ensure all documents are uploaded correctly
• Review the programme selection

Once submitted, you will receive a confirmation email with your application number. Keep this safe for future reference.

tips.title: Tips for Smooth Registration
tips.tip1: • Use a laptop or desktop for filling the form
tips.tip2: • Keep all documents ready before starting
tips.tip4: • Check the eligibility criteria before applying
tips.tip5: • Save screenshots or PDFs of the payment confirmation
tips.tip6: • Save your application number for future reference

cta.description: Start your registration today and take your first step toward joining our institute. Join thousands of students who have successfully begun their journey with us.

hero.title: VLAT Exam Structure
hero.description:
Understanding the structure of the vinayaka mission's law admission test (VLAT) is the first step towards preparing confidently. The exam has been designed to be straightforward, student-friendly, and aligned with the core skills required in law school.

VLAT focuses only on what truly matters for a law aspirant — your ability to comprehend, analyse, and reason logically. There is no rote learning, no memorisation of legal knowledge, and no trick questions.

sections.title: Sections You'll Face
sections.subtitle: Two focused sections to test your law entrance readiness

englishComprehension.title: English Comprehension
englishComprehension.description: Checks how well you understand passages, sentences, and information

logicalReasoning.title: Logical Reasoning
logicalReasoning.description: Measures your ability to think critically and solve problems

questionsMarks.title: Questions & Marks
questionsMarks.subtitle: Simple scoring structure with zero risk
questionsMarks.encouraged: You're encouraged to attempt every question.
questionsMarks.noPenalty: With no negative marking, there's no penalty for trying !

modeLanguage.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the exam. You can switch between languages during the test.
